name: Taylor McNee
detail:
Taylor McNee (née Pelto) was the Art Director for Volume 1, a 3D Artist for RWBY, and is the voice actress for Penny Polendina. She is married to former Rooster Teeth employee Bret McNee. （2016年2月29日喜得贵子）

Her previous work includes 3D assets and animation for Red vs. Blue Season 10, as well as the video games Darksiders II and Warhammer 40,000: Dark Millennium.
